attributes.action: Immediate exit of the European Union uk
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned ask for the immediate exit of the eu , no negotiations just quick exit .
*the eu as a whole , hold parliamentary powers that have been taken away from our parliament
*they force us to weaken our immigration laws .

1. we joined the eec in 1973 . Over those 27 years, we have run a trade deficit with the other member states that averages out at £30 million per day.

2. In 2010 our gross contribution to the EU budget will be £14 billion.

3. On the European Commission’s own figures, the annual costs of EU regulation outweigh the advantages of the single market by €600 to €180 billion.

4. The Common Agricultural Policy costs every family £1200 a year in higher food bills.


5  84 per cent of the legislation in that country came from the EU.

6 Outside the EU, Britain could be a deregulated, competitive, offshore haven.

7.  we’d be a democracy again.
